title: When in Greece
description: 1969. No Edition Remarks. 224 pages. No dust jacket. Yellow paper covered boards. Slight cracking to gutters causing binding to be loose, however pages remain attached. Pages are lightly tanned throughout. Pencil inscription to front free endpaper. Boards have light shelf-wear with corner bumping. Splits to spine edges. Marking to front board.
author: Mary Lathen
